channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description: How can i change the items players wear when they are new?

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

player.java, search for playerLook[5] = 10; or something along those lines. right under it add this:

        playerEquipment[playerHat]=2910;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=4405;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=2906;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2495;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=2912;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=2904;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;

NOTE: you might already have it. if so then don’t add it or anything, just continue. it’s basically self explanatory, if it says playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 4587 then to change the starting weapon you change that item ID.

Read full topic
